## Building a Culture of Collaboration

* I am a 30-year veteran of the academic research library community. 
* My focus has been on delivering and leveraging technology in support of research and learning.
* My career path has included electronic resources, web development, and data science librarianship.

::: {.notes}
*Speaker Notes*

## Educating Undergraduates in Computational Reproducibility

* In collaboration with colleague Sophia Lafferty-Hess, I developed video modules focused on computational reproducibility.
* These modules target undergraduate researchers.
* The focus is on the importance of computational reproducibility in research.

::: {.notes}
*Speaker Notes*
For this project, I partnered with my colleague Sophia Lafferty-Hess to develop video modules focused on computational reproducibility for undergraduate researchers.
